text: niṅṅaḷuṭe kūṭṭattil avar puṟappeṭṭirunneṅkil nāśamallāte maṟṟeānnuṁ avar niṅṅaḷkk kūṭutal nēṭittarumāyirunnilla. niṅṅaḷkk kuḻappaṁ varuttān āgrahiccukeāṇṭ niṅṅaḷuṭe iṭayilūṭe avar parakkampāyukayuṁ ceyyumāyirunnu. niṅṅaḷuṭe kūṭṭattil avar paṟayunnat cevikeāṭutt kēḷkkunna cilaruṇṭ tānuṁ. allāhu akramikaḷeppaṟṟi nannāyi aṟiyunnavanāṇ‌
